English: The total noise generated by your boat minus the environmental noise.
The visibility of your ship in the current environment.
Radars whose wavelength is longer than this value won't be able to detect you.
Determines how audible your boat is to the active sonars on the surface.
The budget assigned to us by Kriegsmarine for resupply and improvements to our equipment.
Energy is generated by diesel engines and consumed by many devices on the boat.
The freshness of the air on the boat may be increased in many ways, but the best way is to simply surface the boat.
Discipline determines how resistant to combat stress your crew is.
Many members of your crew are close to the limit. If stress rises further to the maximum value, one of your sailors may break and reveal his weakness.
Progress to gain the next reputation point. Reputation points may be used to buy improvements in the port.

Key: Mark VII Heavy Depth Charge Shell
Mark VII Upgraded Depth Charge Shell
